QuestData.Title: We Have Him Now
QuestData.Description: We have Gardul right where we want him, commander.$B$BYou're far more equipped to face him than I am. Dispose of him, take his formula from his corpse, and grab as many barrels of poison as you can.$B$BI'll guard this ramp and make sure no reinforcements come to his aid.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect Venomshiv's Secret Formula and $2oa Poison Barrels.
